body: LEAD: The following is a sampling of places to eat barbecue selected by Times correspondents and contributors. Fancy restaurants are not usually where one finds the best barbecue, so some spots may be in no-frill settings on commercial strips or in rundown neighborhoods. The following is a sampling of places to eat barbecue selected by Times
title: A Roundup of Barbecue Places

body: LEAD: To: Messrs. Dukakis, Jackson, Gore, Simon. To: Messrs. Dukakis, Jackson, Gore, Simon. Having traversed the Midwest, scoured the South and nurtured New England for votes, you must now bring your campaigns to one of the nation's most exotic and Byzantine political communities. On, then, to New York. Welcoming your campaigns, more or less, will
title: Political Memo; On Hustings in New York: Buckle Up, Ignore Bumps
